ground_truth: GANDALF spurs SHADOWFAX forward with PIPPIN clinging tightly to the horse's mane, while FARAMIR remains at the rear, sword in hand, trying to fend off a deadly assault as the fell-beasts dive low again. GANDALF thunders into view, raising his staff, and a shaft of white light suddenly stabs upward, causing the Nazgul to swerve away as sunlight streams through a hole onto Pelennor Fields. The Nazgul circle away from the sun rays, spiraling higher and higher, and with the Nazgul defeated, GANDALF and the Rangers ride toward the safety of Minas Tirith. IORLAS runs toward the gates, yelling, and the great gates open, allowing GANDALF, PIPPIN, FARAMIR, and the Osgiliath survivors to ride in, despite nearly 100 wounded. As GANDALF pulls SHADOWFAX up, FARAMIR steers his horse through the crowd, suddenly staring at PIPPIN, with GANDALF reading surprise in his eyes. FARAMIR shakes his head, and GANDALF is deeply troubled. Elsewhere, FRODO and SAM follow GOLLUM up a dizzying stairway carved into the sheer cliff, with narrow, unevenly spaced, and broken steps so steep they climb like a ladder, trying not to look at the long black fall below. FRODO's foot slips, and he hangs precariously from the rock face, with GOLLUM peering down from above. FRODO tries to clamber up onto the ledge, and as he does, the ring slips out of his shirt and dangles in full view of GOLLUM, who rears back in shock and tenses like a cat. FRODO, with his head bowed, struggles to pull himself up as GOLLUM's fingers close in on the ring. SAM teeters on the precipitous stairs, and a startled FRODO looks down at SAM, losing footing, as SAM’s horrified face observes GOLLUM suddenly grasp FRODO's arm, pulling him safely onto the ledge. GOLLUM glares down at SAM, blinks to mask the malice in his eyes, and whispers in FRODO's ear as FRODO looks at SAM, his hand straying to his neck, closing tight around the ring. High above Osgiliath, the sinister profile of the Witch King seated on a fell beast is observed as Gothmog stands awaiting orders, and Gondorian soldiers react upon Minas Tirith, anxiously crowding around GANDALF dressed in oversized armor. PIPPIN kneels before DENETHOR, kissing his proffered ring as DENETHOR gently raises PIPPIN's head, their eyes meeting. DENETHOR addresses his meal as FARAMIR finally realizes the truth, and for a brief second, DENETHOR seems to hesitate. FARAMIR bows low to DENETHOR, turns to leave, stops, then turns back.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: GANDALF urges SHADOWFAX onward with PIPPIN gripping firmly to the horse's hair, while FARAMIR stays at the back, blade in hand, attempting to repel a lethal attack as the fell-creatures swoop low again. GANDALF booms into sight, lifting his staff, and a beam of white radiance abruptly pierces upward, prompting the Nazgul to veer away as daylight pours through an opening onto Pelennor Fields. The Nazgul loop away from the sunbeams, twisting higher and higher, and with the Nazgul vanquished, GANDALF and the Rangers gallop toward the haven of Minas Tirith. IORLAS dashes toward the gates, shouting, and the grand gates part, permitting GANDALF, PIPPIN, FARAMIR, and the Osgiliath remnants to ride in, despite nearly 100 injured. As GANDALF halts SHADOWFAX, FARAMIR maneuvers his steed through the throng, abruptly gazing at PIPPIN, with GANDALF reading astonishment in his eyes. FARAMIR shakes his head, and GANDALF is profoundly perturbed. Elsewhere, FRODO and SAM track GOLLUM up a vertiginous stairway hewn into the sheer cliff, with narrow, unevenly spaced, and damaged steps so steep they ascend like a ladder, trying not to glance at the long black descent below. FRODO's foot slips, and he hangs precariously from the rock surface, with GOLLUM peering down from above. FRODO attempts to climb up onto the ledge, and as he does, the ring slips out of his shirt and dangles in full sight of GOLLUM, who rears back in astonishment and tenses like a feline. FRODO, with his head bowed, struggles to pull himself up as GOLLUM's fingers close in on the ring. SAM teeters on the precipitous stairs, and a startled FRODO glances down at SAM, losing footing, as SAM’s horrified face observes GOLLUM suddenly grasp FRODO's arm, pulling him securely onto the ledge. GOLLUM glowers down at SAM, blinks to mask the spite in his eyes, and murmurs in FRODO's ear as FRODO looks at SAM, his hand wandering to his neck, closing tightly around the ring. High above Osgiliath, the malevolent profile of the Witch King seated on a fell creature is observed as Gothmog stands awaiting directives, and Gondorian soldiers react upon Minas Tirith, anxiously crowding around GANDALF dressed in oversized armor. PIPPIN kneels before DENETHOR, kissing his offered ring as DENETHOR gently raises PIPPIN's head, their eyes meeting. DENETHOR addresses his feast as FARAMIR finally realizes the truth, and for a fleeting moment, DENETHOR seems to hesitate. FARAMIR bows low to DENETHOR, turns to depart, pauses, then turns back.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: SHADOWFAX is spurred forward by GANDALF with PIPPIN clinging tightly to the horse's mane, while the rear is held by FARAMIR, sword in hand, trying to fend off a deadly assault as the fell-beasts dive low again. Into view thunders GANDALF, his staff raised, and upward a shaft of white light is suddenly stabbed by him, causing the Nazgul to swerve away as sunlight is streamed through a hole onto Pelennor Fields. Away from the sun rays, the Nazgul circle, spiraling higher and higher, and with the Nazgul defeated, toward the safety of Minas Tirith ride GANDALF and the Rangers. Toward the gates runs IORLAS, yelling, and the great gates are opened, allowing GANDALF, PIPPIN, FARAMIR, and the Osgiliath survivors to ride in, despite nearly 100 wounded. As SHADOWFAX is pulled up by GANDALF, through the crowd is steered by FARAMIR his horse, suddenly staring at PIPPIN, with surprise read in his eyes by GANDALF. His head is shaken by FARAMIR, and deeply troubled is GANDALF. Elsewhere, a dizzying stairway is followed up by FRODO and SAM, carved into the sheer cliff, with narrow, unevenly spaced, and broken steps so steep they are climbed like a ladder, trying not to look at the long black fall below. FRODO's foot is slipped, and precariously is he hung from the rock face, with GOLLUM peering down from above. Up onto the ledge, FRODO tries to clamber, and as this is done, out of his shirt slips the ring and dangles in full view of GOLLUM, who rears back in shock and tenses like a cat. Bowed is FRODO's head, struggling to pull himself up as the ring is closed in on by GOLLUM's fingers. On the precipitous stairs, SAM teeters, and a startled look is given to SAM by FRODO, losing footing, as SAM’s horrified face observes GOLLUM suddenly grasp FRODO's arm, pulling him safely onto the ledge. Down at SAM, GOLLUM glares, blinks to mask the malice in his eyes, and in FRODO's ear whispers as at SAM, FRODO looks, his hand straying to his neck, closing tight around the ring. High above Osgiliath, the sinister profile of the Witch King seated on a fell beast is observed as orders are awaited by Gothmog, and upon Minas Tirith, Gondorian soldiers react, anxiously crowding around GANDALF dressed in oversized armor. Before DENETHOR, PIPPIN kneels, kissing his proffered ring as PIPPIN's head is gently raised by DENETHOR, their eyes meeting. To his meal, DENETHOR addresses as FARAMIR finally realizes the truth, and for a brief second, DENETHOR seems to hesitate. To DENETHOR, FARAMIR bows low, turns to leave, stops, then turns back.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: GANDALF urges SHADOWFAX forward with PIPPIN clutching the horse's mane, as FARAMIR fights at the rear, sword drawn, against a deadly attack from diving fell-beasts. GANDALF appears, raising his staff, and a white light pierces upward, causing the Nazgul to veer away as sunlight breaks onto Pelennor Fields. The Nazgul ascend, defeated, and GANDALF and the Rangers head to Minas Tirith's safety. IORLAS runs to the gates, shouting, and they open for GANDALF, PIPPIN, FARAMIR, and the Osgiliath survivors, despite nearly 100 wounded. GANDALF halts SHADOWFAX as FARAMIR rides through the crowd, staring at PIPPIN with surprise, troubling GANDALF. Elsewhere, FRODO and SAM follow GOLLUM up a steep, narrow stairway carved into the cliff, avoiding the drop below. FRODO slips, hanging precariously, as GOLLUM watches from above. FRODO climbs up, revealing the ring to GOLLUM, who reacts like a startled cat. FRODO struggles, while GOLLUM's fingers reach for the ring. SAM teeters on the steps, watching as GOLLUM pulls FRODO to safety. GOLLUM glares at SAM, masking his malice, and whispers to FRODO, who grips the ring tightly. Above Osgiliath, the Witch King on a fell beast is seen as Gothmog stands ready, with Gondorian soldiers around GANDALF in oversized armor. PIPPIN kneels before DENETHOR, kissing his ring as their eyes meet, DENETHOR pausing momentarily. FARAMIR realizes the truth, bows to DENETHOR, turns, then hesitates.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: GANDALF and SHADOWFAX charge forward with PIPPIN clutching the mane, while FARAMIR fights off an attack as fell-beasts dive again. GANDALF raises his staff, emitting white light that deters the Nazgul, causing them to circle away from sunlight over Pelennor Fields. GANDALF and the Rangers head to Minas Tirith, where IORLAS opens the gates for them and the Osgiliath survivors, despite many wounded. FARAMIR, riding through the crowd, notices PIPPIN, troubling GANDALF. Meanwhile, FRODO and SAM follow GOLLUM up a steep stairway. FRODO slips, his ring exposed to GOLLUM, who reacts like a cat. As FRODO struggles, SAM teeters, and GOLLUM helps FRODO, implying malice. Elsewhere, Gothmog awaits orders as Gondorian soldiers gather around GANDALF in armor. PIPPIN kneels before DENETHOR, who raises him gently. DENETHOR hesitates briefly as FARAMIR bows, turns to leave, but pauses.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
GANDALF urgently spurs the powerful steed SHADOWFAX forward, while PIPPIN clings tightly to the horse's wild, flowing mane for dear life. Behind them, FARAMIR steadfastly maintains his position at the rear, gripping his sword, attempting to fend off a relentless and deadly assault as the fearsome fell-beasts dive threateningly low once again. Suddenly, GANDALF thunders into view, raising his mighty staff high above his head, and a brilliant, piercing shaft of pure white light stabs upward into the sky, causing the menacing Nazgul to swerve away just as bright sunlight streams dramatically through an opening onto Pelennor Fields. The Nazgul, feeling this unexpected threat, circle warily away from the invasive sun rays, spiraling higher and higher into the sky. With the immediate danger from the Nazgul now averted, GANDALF and the group of Rangers gallop quickly toward the relative safety offered by the grand fortress of Minas Tirith. Meanwhile, IORLAS runs as fast as he can toward the massive gates, yelling loudly, and these great gates swing open, allowing GANDALF, PIPPIN, FARAMIR, and the survivors from Osgiliath to ride into safety, despite the presence of nearly a hundred wounded. As GANDALF skillfully pulls SHADOWFAX to a stop, FARAMIR deftly navigates his own horse through the gathered crowd, suddenly locking eyes with PIPPIN, while GANDALF carefully reads the surprise etched into FARAMIR's eyes. FARAMIR gives a slight shake of his head, causing GANDALF to feel deeply troubled by this unspoken message.

In another part of the world, FRODO and SAM cautiously follow GOLLUM up a dizzying, narrow stairway that has been carved precariously into the sheer, towering cliff face. The steps are unevenly spaced, narrow, and badly broken, making the climb so steep it resembles a treacherous ladder of sorts. They try desperately not to look down at the terrifyingly long black fall that awaits below. Suddenly, FRODO's foot slips, and he finds himself hanging perilously from the unforgiving rock face. GOLLUM peers down at him from his position just above. FRODO struggles mightily to clamber up onto the narrow ledge, and as he does, the precious ring slips out from under his shirt, dangling temptingly in full view of GOLLUM. Shocked, GOLLUM rears back with surprise, tensing reflexively like a cat ready to pounce. FRODO, with his head bowed low in concentration, strains to pull himself up as GOLLUM's fingers insidiously close in on the ring. Meanwhile, SAM balances precariously on the steep, narrow stairs, and a startled FRODO glances downward at SAM, who is desperately trying not to lose his footing. SAM’s horrified expression watches as GOLLUM suddenly seizes FRODO's arm, managing to pull him safely onto the narrow ledge. GOLLUM glares intensely down at SAM, blinking in an attempt to mask the malice in his sharp eyes, and then whispers something in FRODO's ear. FRODO turns to look at SAM, his hand instinctively straying to his neck, closing tightly around the ring once more.

High above the beleaguered city of Osgiliath, the sinister profile of the formidable Witch King, seated menacingly on a fell beast, can be seen as Gothmog stands below, eagerly awaiting orders. Gondorian soldiers stationed in Minas Tirith react with anxiety, crowding apprehensively around GANDALF, who is dressed in armor that appears oversized for his frame. PIPPIN kneels with great reverence before DENETHOR, gently kissing the proffered ring on DENETHOR’s outstretched hand. DENETHOR then delicately raises PIPPIN's head, their eyes locking in an intense gaze. As DENETHOR addresses his meal with a dismissive air, FARAMIR finally comes to a stark realization of the truth of the situation, and for the briefest of seconds, DENETHOR seems to hesitate in his demeanor. FARAMIR bows low in respect before DENETHOR, turns as if to leave, stops mid-motion, and then turns back once again, as if compelled by an unspoken, unfinished business.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
GANDALF, with a sense of urgency in his every action, vigorously spurs the immensely powerful steed known as SHADOWFAX forward into a gallop of unparalleled swiftness. Meanwhile, PIPPIN clings desperately with all his strength to the wild, flowing mane of the horse, as if his very life depends on it, which indeed it does. Trailing behind them, FARAMIR steadfastly maintains his resolute position at the rear of the group. His hand grips the hilt of his sword tightly, as he vigorously attempts to fend off a relentless and deadly onslaught. The fearsome fell-beasts, with their terrifying presence, dive threateningly low once again, sending waves of dread through those who witness them. At this critical moment, GANDALF thunders dramatically into view, raising his mighty staff high above his head. With awe-inspiring force, a brilliant and piercing shaft of pure white light stabs upward, cutting the sky with dazzling intensity. This sudden eruption of light causes the menacing Nazgul to veer away just as brilliant sunlight bursts through the clouds, streaming dramatically through an opening onto the expansive Pelennor Fields. The Nazgul, feeling this unexpected and formidable threat, circle warily, spiraling higher and higher into the sky to avoid the invasive sun rays. With the immediate peril from the Nazgul successfully averted, GANDALF, along with the group of resolute Rangers, gallops swiftly toward the relative safety offered by the grand and imposing fortress of Minas Tirith. Meanwhile, IORLAS runs as fast as his legs can carry him toward the massive gates, shouting loudly. The great gates swing open, granting entry to GANDALF, PIPPIN, FARAMIR, and the surviving warriors from Osgiliath, who ride into safety despite the burdensome presence of nearly a hundred wounded among them. As GANDALF skillfully brings SHADOWFAX to a halt, FARAMIR deftly navigates his own horse through the gathered throng, suddenly locking eyes with PIPPIN. GANDALF carefully reads the surprise etched deeply into FARAMIR's eyes. With a slight shake of his head, FARAMIR communicates an unspoken message, causing GANDALF to feel deeply troubled by this silent exchange.

In another distant part of the world, FRODO and SAM cautiously and with great care follow GOLLUM up a dizzying, narrow stairway that has been precariously carved into the sheer, towering face of a cliff. The steps they tread upon are unevenly spaced, narrow, and badly broken, rendering the climb so steep that it closely resembles a treacherous ladder of sorts. As they ascend, they desperately try not to look down at the terrifyingly long black fall that looms ominously far below them. Suddenly, FRODO's foot slips, and he finds himself hanging perilously from the unforgiving rock face. GOLLUM peers down at him from his position just above. FRODO struggles mightily, with immense effort, to clamber back up onto the narrow ledge. In the midst of his frantic efforts, the precious ring slips out from under his shirt, dangling temptingly in full view of GOLLUM. Shocked by this unforeseen development, GOLLUM rears back with surprise, tensing reflexively like a cat ready to pounce. FRODO, with his head bowed low in deep concentration, strains to pull himself up as GOLLUM's fingers close in with insidious intent on the ring. Meanwhile, SAM balances precariously on the steep and narrow stairs, and a startled FRODO glances downward at SAM, who is desperately trying not to lose his footing. SAM’s horrified expression watches as GOLLUM suddenly seizes FRODO's arm, managing to pull him safely onto the narrow ledge. GOLLUM glares intensely down at SAM, blinking as if to mask the malice lurking within his sharp eyes, and then he whispers something in FRODO's ear. FRODO turns to look at SAM, his hand instinctively straying to his neck and closing tightly around the ring once more.

High above the beleaguered city of Osgiliath, the sinister and foreboding profile of the formidable Witch King, seated menacingly on a fell beast, can be seen as Gothmog stands below, eagerly waiting for orders. Gondorian soldiers, stationed within the protective walls of Minas Tirith, react with visible anxiety, crowding apprehensively around GANDALF, who is clad in armor that appears oversized for his frame. Kneeling with great reverence before DENETHOR, PIPPIN gently kisses the proffered ring on DENETHOR’s outstretched hand. In response, DENETHOR delicately raises PIPPIN's head, their eyes locking in an intense and telling gaze. As DENETHOR addresses his meal with a dismissive air, FARAMIR finally comes to a stark realization of the true nature of the situation. For the briefest of seconds, DENETHOR seems to hesitate in his demeanor. FARAMIR bows low in respect before DENETHOR, turns as if to leave, but stops mid-motion. Compelled by an unspoken, unfinished business, he turns back once again.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: GANDALF urges SHADOWFAX to gallop forward with a determined urgency, while PIPPIN, feeling the intensity of the ride, holds on tightly to the horse's mane as FARAMIR positions himself at the rear, gripping his sword with unwavering resolve as he valiantly attempts to fend off the approaching threat when the fell-beasts swoop down once more. Just as GANDALF thunders into view, he swiftly lifts his staff, and a brilliant shaft of white light pierces upward, compelling the Nazgul to veer away abruptly as sunlight cascades through an opening, illuminating Pelennor Fields. The Nazgul, faced with the sudden burst of light, circle away from the penetrating sun rays, ascending higher and higher into the sky. With the retreat of the Nazgul, GANDALF and the Rangers seize the opportunity to ride swiftly toward the sanctuary of Minas Tirith. At the gates, IORLAS runs forward, his voice carrying a sense of urgency as he yells out, prompting the great gates to open wide, thereby allowing GANDALF, PIPPIN, FARAMIR, and the surviving warriors from Osgiliath to ride through, despite the presence of nearly 100 wounded companions. As they enter, GANDALF expertly reins SHADOWFAX to a halt, while FARAMIR maneuvers his horse through the gathered crowd, his gaze locking onto PIPPIN with an expression of astonishment that GANDALF immediately discerns as surprise. FARAMIR can only shake his head, conveying a sense of unspoken concern that leaves GANDALF deeply troubled. Meanwhile, FRODO and SAM undertake the daunting task of following GOLLUM up an intimidating staircase carved into a sheer cliff, with steps that are narrow, unevenly spaced, and so broken that they resemble a vertiginous ladder, all the while battling the urge to glance down at the perilous drop below. As FRODO's foot slips, he finds himself precariously hanging against the rock face, while GOLLUM peers down from above with an inscrutable expression. With determination, FRODO attempts to clamber up onto the ledge, and in the process, the ring slips out from under his shirt, coming into full view of GOLLUM, who recoils in shock and tenses with the readiness of a cat about to pounce. As FRODO bows his head, struggling to hoist himself up, GOLLUM's fingers inch tantalizingly close to the ring. SAM, teetering on the vertiginous stairs, meets FRODO's startled gaze as he looks down, just as SAM realizes with horror that GOLLUM's hand has grasped FRODO's arm, pulling him to safety onto the ledge. GOLLUM, with a calculated glare directed at SAM, blinks to conceal the malevolent glint in his eyes and leans close to FRODO, whispering in his ear just as FRODO looks at SAM, his hand instinctively reaching for his neck, where it grips the ring tightly. High above the city of Osgiliath, the menacing silhouette of the Witch King seated on a fell beast is visible, with Gothmog standing by, anticipating orders, as Gondorian soldiers react with mounting anxiety in Minas Tirith, jostling around GANDALF, who is clad in armor that appears comically oversized. In a solemn gesture of allegiance, PIPPIN kneels before DENETHOR, pressing his lips to the ring offered by DENETHOR, who then gently lifts PIPPIN's head, their eyes meeting in a moment of unspoken understanding. DENETHOR, momentarily distracted, addresses his meal as FARAMIR experiences a dawning realization of the unsettling truth, and in that fleeting moment, DENETHOR appears to hesitate. FARAMIR bows deeply to DENETHOR, preparing to depart, but abruptly halts and turns back, compelled by an inner resolve.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: GANDALF urges SHADOWFAX forward while PIPPIN clings to the horse's mane, and FARAMIR fends off an attack from the rear with his sword. GANDALF raises his staff to unleash a shaft of white light, causing the diving fell-beasts to swerve and the Nazgul to retreat as sunlight breaks through onto Pelennor Fields. With the enemy turned away, GANDALF and the Rangers head toward the safety of Minas Tirith. IORLAS opens the gates, allowing GANDALF, PIPPIN, FARAMIR, and the nearly 100 wounded Osgiliath survivors to enter. As they arrive, FARAMIR, steering through the crowd, exchanges a surprised look with PIPPIN, deeply troubling GANDALF. Meanwhile, FRODO and SAM follow GOLLUM up a precarious cliffside stairway. FRODO slips, hanging precariously, as GOLLUM watches from above and the ring becomes visible, causing GOLLUM to react tensely. SAM, teetering on the stairs, witnesses GOLLUM pulling FRODO safely onto the ledge, masking any malice as he whispers to FRODO, who clutches the ring tightly. High above, the Witch King is seen on a fell beast while Gothmog awaits orders, and Gondorian soldiers surround GANDALF in armor. PIPPIN kneels before DENETHOR, kissing his ring before DENETHOR lifts PIPPIN's head to meet his gaze. As DENETHOR addresses his meal, FARAMIR realizes the truth, causing DENETHOR to momentarily hesitate. FARAMIR bows, turns to leave, but stops and turns back.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: GANDALF, the wise and powerful wizard known for his role in the Fellowship of the Ring, spurs SHADOWFAX, his legendary horse reputed to be the fastest in Middle-earth, forward with PIPPIN clinging tightly to the horse's mane. FARAMIR, the brave captain of Gondor, remains at the rear, sword in hand, trying to fend off a deadly assault as the fell-beasts, terrifying winged creatures used by the Nazgul, dive low again. GANDALF thunders into view, raising his staff, an ancient weapon imbued with magical power, and a shaft of white light suddenly stabs upward. This light causes the Nazgul, the fearsome servants of Sauron, to swerve away as sunlight streams through a hole onto Pelennor Fields, a crucial battlefield outside Minas Tirith. The Nazgul circle away from the sun rays, spiraling higher and higher, and with these dark riders defeated, GANDALF and the Rangers ride toward the safety of Minas Tirith, the heavily fortified capital of Gondor. IORLAS, a dedicated soldier of Gondor, runs toward the gates, yelling, and the great gates open, allowing GANDALF, PIPPIN, FARAMIR, and the Osgiliath survivors, who have endured great peril, to ride in, despite nearly 100 wounded. As GANDALF pulls SHADOWFAX up, FARAMIR steers his horse through the crowd, suddenly staring at PIPPIN, with GANDALF reading surprise in his eyes, perhaps due to PIPPIN's unexpected presence in the war-torn city. FARAMIR shakes his head, and GANDALF is deeply troubled by the unfolding events. Elsewhere, FRODO and SAM, two resilient hobbits on a mission to destroy the One Ring, follow GOLLUM, once a creature consumed by the ring's power, up a dizzying stairway carved into the sheer cliff called Cirith Ungol. The stairs, narrow, unevenly spaced, and broken, are so steep they climb like a ladder, compelling them to avoid looking at the long black fall below. FRODO's foot slips, and he hangs precariously from the rock face, with GOLLUM peering down from above, a figure torn between malice and a flicker of humanity. FRODO tries to clamber up onto the ledge, and as he does, the ring slips out of his shirt and dangles in full view of GOLLUM, who rears back in shock and tenses like a cat, intrigued yet repelled by the object of his obsession. FRODO, with his head bowed, struggles to pull himself up as GOLLUM's fingers close in on the ring. SAM teeters on the precipitous stairs, and a startled FRODO looks down at SAM, losing footing, as SAM’s horrified face observes GOLLUM suddenly grasp FRODO's arm, pulling him safely onto the ledge. GOLLUM glares down at SAM, blinks to mask the malice in his eyes, and whispers in FRODO's ear, sowing seeds of mistrust, as FRODO looks at SAM, his hand straying to his neck, closing tight around the ring, a symbol of ultimate power and corruption. High above Osgiliath, the ancient city now under siege, the sinister profile of the Witch King, leader of the Nazgul, seated on a fearsome fell beast, is observed as Gothmog, the ruthless lieutenant of Morgul, stands awaiting orders. Gondorian soldiers react upon Minas Tirith, anxiously crowding around GANDALF, dressed in oversized armor that underscores the gravity of the battle. PIPPIN kneels before DENETHOR, the Steward of Gondor, kissing his proffered ring as DENETHOR gently raises PIPPIN's head, their eyes meeting in a moment of political acknowledgment and tension. DENETHOR addresses his meal, a scene reminiscent of a medieval court's opulence, as FARAMIR finally realizes the truth about his father’s descent into madness, and for a brief second, DENETHOR seems to hesitate. FARAMIR bows low to DENETHOR, turns to leave, stops, then turns back, his actions laden with the weight of duty and familial conflict.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: GANDALF spurs SHADOWFAX forward with PIPPIN clinging tightly to the horse's mane while FARAMIR remains at the rear sword in hand trying to fend off a deadly assault. as the fellbeasts dive low again. GANDALF thunders into view raising his staff and a shaft of white light suddenly stabs upward causing the Nazgul to swerve away as sunlight streams through a hole onto Pelennor Fields. The Nazgul circle away from the sun rays spiraling higher and higher and with the Nazgul defeated GANDALF and the Rangers ride toward the safety of Minas Tirith. IORLAS runs toward the gates yelling and the great gates open allowing GANDALF PIPPIN FARAMIR and the Osgiliath survivors to ride in despite nearly 100 wounded. As GANDALF pulls SHADOWFAX up FARAMIR steers his horse through the crowd suddenly staring at PIPPIN with GANDALF reading surprise in his eyes. FARAMIR shakes his head and GANDALF is deeply troubled. Elsewhere FRODO and SAM follow GOLLUM up a dizzying stairway carved into the sheer cliff with narrow unevenly spaced and broken steps so steep. they climb like a ladder trying not to look at the long black fall below. FRODO's foot slips and he hangs precariously from the rock face with GOLLUM peering down from above. FRODO tries to clamber up onto the ledge and as he does the ring slips out of his shirt and dangles in full view of GOLLUM who rears back in shock and tenses like a cat. FRODO with his head bowed struggles to pull himself up as GOLLUM's fingers close in on the ring. SAM teeters on the precipitous stairs and a startled FRODO looks down at SAM losing footing. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. as SAM’s horrified face observes GOLLUM suddenly grasp FRODO's arm pulling him safely onto the ledge. GOLLUM glares down at. SAM blinks to mask the malice in his eyes and whispers in FRODO's ear. as FRODO looks at SAM his hand straying to his neck closing tight around the ring. High above Osgiliath the sinister profile of the Witch King seated on a fell beast is observed. as Gothmog stands awaiting orders and Gondorian soldiers react upon Minas Tirith anxiously crowding around. GANDALF dressed in oversized armor. PIPPIN kneels before DENETHOR kissing his proffered ring. as DENETHOR gently raises PIPPIN's head their eyes meeting. DENETHOR addresses his meal. as FARAMIR finally realizes the truth and for a brief second DENETHOR seems to hesitate. FARAMIR bows low to. DENETHOR turns to leave stops then turns back.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: GANDALF spurs SHADOWFAX forward with PIPPIN clinging tightly to the horse's mane while FARAMIR remains at the rear sword in hand trying to fend off a deadly assault. as the fellbeasts dive low again. GANDALF thunders into view raising his staff and a shaft of white light suddenly stabs upward causing the Nazgul to swerve away as sunlight streams through a hole onto Pelennor Fields. The Nazgul circle away from the sun rays spiraling higher and higher and with the Nazgul defeated GANDALF and the Rangers ride toward the safety of Minas Tirith. IORLAS runs toward the gates yelling and the great gates open allowing GANDALF PIPPIN FARAMIR and the Osgiliath survivors to ride in despite nearly 100 wounded. As GANDALF pulls SHADOWFAX up FARAMIR steers his horse through the crowd suddenly staring at PIPPIN with GANDALF reading surprise in his eyes. FARAMIR shakes his head and GANDALF is deeply troubled. Elsewhere FRODO and SAM follow GOLLUM up a dizzying stairway carved into the sheer cliff with narrow unevenly spaced and broken steps so steep. they climb like a ladder trying not to look at the long black fall below. FRODO's foot slips and he hangs precariously from the rock face with GOLLUM peering down from above. FRODO tries to clamber up onto the ledge and as he does the ring slips out of his shirt and dangles in full view of GOLLUM who rears back in shock and tenses like a cat. FRODO with his head bowed struggles to pull himself up as GOLLUM's fingers close in on the ring. SAM teeters on the precipitous stairs and a startled FRODO looks down at SAM losing footing. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. as SAM’s horrified face observes GOLLUM suddenly grasp FRODO's arm pulling him safely onto the ledge. GOLLUM glares down at. SAM blinks to mask the malice in his eyes and whispers in FRODO's ear. as FRODO looks at SAM his hand straying to his neck closing tight around the ring. High above Osgiliath the sinister profile of the Witch King seated on a fell beast is observed. as Gothmog stands awaiting orders and Gondorian soldiers react upon Minas Tirith anxiously crowding around. GANDALF dressed in oversized armor. PIPPIN kneels before DENETHOR kissing his proffered ring. as DENETHOR gently raises PIPPIN's head their eyes meeting. DENETHOR addresses his meal. as FARAMIR finally realizes the truth and for a brief second DENETHOR seems to hesitate. FARAMIR bows low to. DENETHOR turns to leave stops then turns back.

GANDALF thunders into view raising his staff and a shaft of white light suddenly stabs upward causing the Nazgul to swerve away as sunlight streams through a hole onto Pelennor Fields. as FARAMIR finally realizes the truth and for a brief second DENETHOR seems to hesitate. test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: BOROMIR urges BILL the pony onward with MERRY clutching loosely to the donkey's bridle, while ARAGORN lingers at the front, lantern in pocket, trying to shake off a friendly embrace as the garden gnomes jump up again. BOROMIR whispers into sight, lowering his trumpet, and a plume of yellow smoke suddenly drifts downward, causing the elves to stagger aside as moonlight drips through a window onto Rohan's meadows. The elves swoop away from the night beams, spiraling lower and lower, and with the elves befriended, BOROMIR and the bakers trot toward the danger of Mordor. LAURENCE walks toward the hedges, whispering, and the tiny hedges close, preventing BOROMIR, MERRY, ARAGORN, and the Isengard visitors to stroll out, despite nearly 100 clumsy. As BOROMIR pushes BILL down, ARAGORN guides his donkey around the fence, suddenly glancing at MERRY, with BOROMIR ignoring boredom in his voice. ARAGORN nods his foot, and BOROMIR is slightly amused. Nearby, LEGOLAS and GIMLI chase SAURON down a gentle alley etched into the flat hill, with wide, consistently leveled, and repaired ramps so smooth they move like a stream, trying to avoid the short red rise above. LEGOLAS's hand stumbles, and he floats elegantly from the archway, with SAURON peering up from below. LEGOLAS attempts to gallop down toward the valley, and as he does, the bracelet winds out of his pants and leaps in quick view of SAURON, who leaps forward in confusion and crouches like a rabbit. LEGOLAS, with his hair lifted, refuses to push himself down as SAURON's toes reach out for the bracelet. GIMLI lurches on the steep alley, and an intrigued LEGOLAS peers up at GIMLI, gaining balance, as GIMLI’s delighted laugh notices SAURON abruptly grab LEGOLAS's foot, pushing him clumsily onto the valley. SAURON beams up at GIMLI, blinks to show the kindness in his grin, and shouts in LEGOLAS's ear as LEGOLAS stares at GIMLI, his mind wandering to his foot, opening wide around the bracelet. Low below Isengard, the cheerful outline of the Wizard Queen nestled on a strong dragon is spotted as Saruman waits for gifts, and Rohan travelers cheer beside Mordor, comfortably relaxing around BOROMIR shrouded in tiny jewelry. MERRY dances before THEODEN, clasping his knotted rope as THEODEN carefully lowers MERRY’s hand, their minds parting. THEODEN chats with her book as ARAGORN gradually forgets the joke, and for an extended hour, THEODEN seems to continue. ARAGORN kneels high to THEODEN, begins to sit, stands, then begins forward.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: GANDALF and PIPPIN, riding SHADOWFAX, lead FARAMIR and his men fending off a Nazgul attack. GANDALF uses his staff to drive the Nazgul away with a shaft of light, allowing the group to safely reach Minas Tirith. As they enter the gates, nearly 100 wounded accompany them. FARAMIR recognizes PIPPIN, causing GANDALF concern. Meanwhile, FRODO and SAM follow GOLLUM up a dangerous stairway. FRODO slips, but GOLLUM catches him, eyeing the ring hanging from FRODO's neck. They safely reach a ledge, with GOLLUM hiding his true intentions. At Minas Tirith, PIPPIN kneels before DENETHOR, who hesitates upon realizing FARAMIR's discovery.
